headline: How Strong Results, U.S. Onshoring, and EV Recalls At General Motors (GM) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Recently, General Motors reported revenue and EBITDA results ahead of expectations, highlighted resilient North American demand for trucks and SUVs, expanded its U.S. manufacturing plans with a US$4.00 billion onshoring program, and began recalling nearly 21,000 Chevrolet Equinox EVs in Canada to fix a software issue via over-the-air updates. At the same time, the company’s large share buybacks, growing focus on electrification and software, and higher U.S. capacity ambitions have reinforced...
